Text: Oñ i lewatu, e̩gba kʼo̩do̩ mudako, iko kʼamonu adufu nyʼoko ogu Defid fu Joab kpʼabuko̩lo̩-wñ manyʼabo Israe̩l chaka kpe̩ lo; oñ ma fʼamo̩ma Amo̩n kpo̩fo̩, ma ño̩ kpala nyu Raba. Defid muda dʼe̩re̩ ma ubi Je̩rusale̩m.
Oñ i lewatʼolane̩ ku Defid kwane̩ kwʼoj ate̩-wñ oñ i tʼojokunyi onu ale. I dʼojokunyi o̩mo̩ oñ i li onobule̩ʼka kʼi dago agwo̩la; onobule̩ le̩ la che̩fe̩rʼeju tabale.
Taku Defid fʼone̩ kpe̩ nyʼatene inabali onobule̩ le̩. Oñ e̩ne̩ʼka kakini, I che Batsheba, o̩ma Eliam, kʼi chʼo̩ya Uraya, e̩ne̩ He̩t, le̩ de̩ n?
Taku Defid fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼamʼu du wa; oñ onobule̩ le̩ wʼejefu ugbo-wñ, tak i bʼo̩ dachi (todu i fʼo̩la-wñ gworinyo̩ bʼo̩la edaji-wñ te̩ e̩gbale̩ me̩). Tak i mudabi tʼunyi-wñ.
Onobule̩ le̩ la fʼefu nyo̩, oñ i fʼone̩ kpe̩ wa aka ñwu Defid kakini, Ochu alʼumi oji me̩.
Taku Defid fʼuche̩ kperu Joab, kakini, FʼUraya, e̩ne̩ He̩t le̩, kpe̩ wʼugbo mi. Taku Joab fʼUraya kpe̩ nyʼugbo Defid.
Oñ e̩gba kʼUraya lewʼugbo-wñ, Defid tene o̩lafia Joab, kpai o̩lafia amone̩, kpai inabali ogu.
Taku Defid ka ñw Uraya kakini, Gwo̩ru nyʼunyi-we̩, kʼe̩ rʼiñmi ta. Taku Uraya kwef unyi onu dufu, oñ ma nʼe̩wñ ojo onu tʼo̩ ubi.
Uraya muda lolu alugbana unyi onu amanyʼabuko̩lo̩ odu-wñ chaka; i la gwo̩ru nyʼunyi-wñ n.
Oñ e̩gba ku ma ka ñwu Defid kakini, Uraya gwo̩ru nyʼunyi-wñ n. Defid ka ñw Uraya kakini, I chʼule̩ e̩ kwo wa-i n? E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ ma gwo̩ru nyʼunyi-we̩ n?

Tak Uraya ka ñwu Defid kakini, Akpati O̩jo̩, kpʼabo Israe̩l, kpʼabo Juda jʼef ala ala le̩; odu-mi, Joab, kpʼabuko̩lo̩ odu-mi ru jo̩ egbili gbaa; tak omi anyʼunyi-mi aje̩ e̩wñ, añmo̩, kʼu ño̩ bʼo̩ya-mi dachi? Oji-we̩, alu kʼonugo-we̩ deju, nache e̩wñ le̩ n.
Taku Defid ka ñw Uraya kakini, gugu emi eñini ta, o̩na tak u naje̩ ñw e̩ lo. Abe̩le̩ Uraya gugu Je̩rusule̩m o̩jo̩ le̩, kpai o̩jo̩ñwa-wñ ge̩.
Tak e̩gba ku Defid fʼu do̩, i fʼe̩wñ je̩, i ño̩ ñmo̩ eju-wñ; tak i je̩ ñw o̩te̩ fʼu mu. Oñ e̩gba ane̩ i ledufu kʼi dachi oj ate̩-wñ manyʼabuko̩lo̩ odu-wñ, i muda gwo̩ru nyʼunyi-wñ n.
Oñ i lewatʼodudu-wñ, Defid la fʼo̩takada ko̩ru Joab, oñ i mʼu du kpuche̩ lʼo̩wo̩ Uraya.
I ko̩ nyʼef o̩takada le̩ kakini, DʼUraya-i dago o̩gba ogu ugbo kʼi kpuna tule, tak e̩ te̩ ubi bʼo̩ te̩, ku ma mʼu du kpa.
Oñ i lewatu, e̩gba ku Joab do̩mo̩ adide ewo le̩, i mʼuña bu ñw Uraya ugbo kʼi ma kʼame̩nagbiti jo̩.
Tak aboke̩le̩ ewo le̩ kwodufu wa ajogu kpai Joab; amone̩ iche̩ka ku ma chʼabuko̩lo̩ Defid la wane̩ o̩mo̩; Uraya e̩ne̩ He̩t le̩ ño̩ leku ge̩.
Taku Joab fʼone̩ kpe̩ nyʼaka ñwu Defid o̩la e̩wñ du ki che ugbo ogu le̩;
oñ i ñwa ñw onuche̩-wñ kakini, E̩gba kʼe̩ fʼo̩la e̩wñ ki che ugbo ogu-i ka ñw onu kpoji,
iche̩wñ kʼonu kʼe̩do̩fulu kʼi ka ñw e̩ kakini, E̩wñ chi ku me̩ te̩ me̩ru ewo abe̩i taku me̩ jogu ta? Me̩ ma ka kʼama ajʼoj aku ato̩fa ñwu me̩ n?

E̩ne̩ gwʼAbime̩le̩k o̩ma Je̩rubeshe̩t, dajane̩ le̩? I chʼonobule̩ dago oj o̩do̩ dʼo̩mo̩bolo̩ ro̩ dʼo oji todu kʼi ku Tebe̩zi n? E̩wñ chi ku me̩ te̩ me̩rʼaku abe̩i? E̩gbale̩ e̩ ka kakini, Adu-we̩ Uraya e̩ne̩ He̩t le̩ ño̩ leku ge̩.
Abe̩le̩ onuche̩ le̩ le, oñ i mʼinabali e̩wñ du ku Joab kpʼo̩ uche̩ du ña Defid.
Onuche̩ le̩ la ka ñwu Defid kakini, Abo le̩ tʼuwa le, oñ ma dufu wʼugbo wa egbili, tak a la bʼuma ma gbogbo wʼalu aku.
Abo ku ma nʼo̩o̩do̩ la jʼoj o̩do̩ ato̩fa ñw amadu-we̩; amadu onu iche̩kibo̩ la leku, adu-we̩ Uraya e̩ne̩ He̩t le̩ ño̩ leku ge̩.

Taku Defid ka ñw onuche̩ le̩ kakini, Abu kʼuwe̩ aka ñwu Joab de̩ kakini, E̩wñ-i ki bie̩ne̩ eju-we̩ n, todu o̩kwo̩chageli agwʼe-tʼe-du da abe̩le̩; fʼogu-we̩ bʼefu ku me̩ ko bʼewo le̩ ku me̩ fʼu gulo̩. Uwe̩ ki dʼugbe̩do̩ ñw u abe̩le̩.
E̩gba kʼo̩ya Uraya le̩ gbo̩ ka kʼUraya o̩ko̩-wñ leku, i la deku o̩ko-wñ.
Tak e̩gba kʼi fʼeku da kpa, Defid fʼonuche̩ kpe̩ wa mʼowñ du wʼunyi-wñ, oñ i mud o̩ya-wñ, i la fʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ bi ñw u. E̩wñ ku Defid che le̩ muda bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa.
